summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 22nd Avenue South in the City of Seattle, from Yesler Way to King Street, by constructing sewers therein, together with appurtenances, all in accordance with Resolution No. 399 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
